cyclone.name: HARVEY
cyclone.current_location: about 250 miles SE of Corpus Christi, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: Continuing northwest toward the middle Texas coast, then expected to slow and meander near or just inland of the coast through the weekend
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: middle Texas coast (near Corpus Christi–Port O’Connor area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane/Tropical-Storm watches confined to the south Texas coast; none in the eastern Caribbean
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane and Storm-Surge warnings from Port Mansfield to Sargent, TX; no warnings in the Virgin Islands
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Middle and upper Texas coastline and adjacent western Gulf waters
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: Not listed (no Caribbean sites in table)
